Question: Shenzhen Diyatel Electronics Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Diyatel Electronics Co.,Ltd

Product: X1 Interpreter Hub

- Breakthrough all-in-one integrated design
- World's first multi-language simultaneous interpretation system
- Speed and accuracy of translation across a wide range of languages
- Suitable for online and offline business meetings
- Combines ear-to-ear wearable translation technology with portability and compact design
